question: The first iron and steel industry of India was established in which of the following cities?
explanation: In terms of domestic production, Tata Steel is largest and first iron and steel industry company in India. Its first plant of Tata Steel was established in Jamshedpur and registered office is in Mumbai. It was established by Jamsedji Nusserwanji Tata in 1907. It is one of the top steel producing companies globally with annual crude steel deliveries of 27.5 million tonnes.
